content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: What is your initial offer for the monthly rental price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm looking for €1,000 a month. That's my starting point.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your starting point, Maryam. I can offer €1,200 a month. I believe this is a fair price for the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I already have a tenant who is willing to pay €1,300 a month. I hope you understand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Maryam. I can meet your tenant's offer. How about €1,300 a month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1300] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1300] Euro! TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
